item.title: Mouse coord
item.dc:creator: @Dan0194 Dan0194
item.description:
@Dan0194 wrote:

boi_jx:

whats the command to find the mouse coordinants on the screen like im truying to ad da button to a certain location ijust need the command to get the mouse coordinants

If your trying to find the x and y coordinates of your mouse go to your RSApplet(client-sided) and look for

in that method add

Now whenever you click on the screen it should print out the coordinates.
